description: Disseminating the S&T Development Experience of ROK to Developing Countries and Upgrading the S&T Policy

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of partner countries  to achieve the MDGs, through transfer of ROK's development experience and knowledge.
subproject.description: Capacity of selected ROK government officials has been strengthened by learning effective planning and implementation S&T policies in advanced countries and developing countries.
subproject.title: Promotion of ROK Experiences i

title: Promotion of ROK Experiences in S&T
